website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for homeowners who need reliable, strong pressure washing for household tasks like cleaning decks and driveways.
pros: Very easy setup, so it's ready to use immediately
Delivers 1800 psi at 1.2 gallons per minute
Easy to turn on and off with a large foot switch
Its industry-standard connections make it simple to attach different hoses
cons: The plastic wheels and connection points may wear out more quickly

customer_reviews.title: This is the BIGGEST piece of CRAP ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the BIGGEST piece of CRAP ever made!!!!! I assembled it and followed the instructions as were written. The unit LEAKED from the hose connection as well as from under the motor unit!!!~!! Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than 1 year, used 2 times
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this washer to clean up my front stairs back in 05/27/2018. I used it and it did a great job. Fast forward to 04/04/2019 to use it for the second time to clean my car and this thing is already broken. Water comes out from the handle, you are basically giving yourself a shower. This product is complete garbage, do yourself a favor, and DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY with this power washer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mata

customer_reviews.title: Replacement policy is like pulling teeth
customer_reviews.text: Used twice in 3 weeks time and unit failed. Replacement policy is like pulling teeth.Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michelle I.

customer_reviews.title: Hose connection cheap and frustrating - leaks like crazy.  Absolutely have to replace it in order to use the unit successfully
customer_reviews.text: WHile the unit operates well, the chintzy cheap hose connection is so frustrating as to make the unit become a dust gatherer in the garage. Fixed it by buying a new hose with a large connector, cutting off the male end and attaching a new female end to connect to the water source. Works well afterwards - Karcher should ditch the cheap connector and spend a few bucks getting a good one for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: R Griswell

customer_reviews.title: Karcher not standing behind its warranty
customer_reviews.text: This product has not worked correctly from the start then it had a major mechanical failure causing oil to leak out. After cleaning it up to try and see the issue the stickered serial number apparently got wiped off. Now even with the receipt from Amazon Karcher will not honor their warranty. Wish I bought this at Costco as they make suppliers support products
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tochtrop

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, Pressure washer didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Junk, it didn't last a month. Started to lose pressure after the first week. Very cheap lite metal and plastic construction. I'll update post after checking with Karcher about their warranty. Recommendation, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: During the time I was able to use this machine (which was only 4 times), it worked ok. A little hard to maneuver it around the yard. The water hose was very stiff to where it coiled up while I was using it and busted so I had to purchase another hose. I would have preferred a bit stronger of a spray to clean my pool screen. Having it only 3 months, I plugged it in and nothing. No power! I did everything I could to get it to work but failed. It was put out for trash pickup!
customer_reviews.author: DeeMBruemmer

customer_reviews.title: Good Power Washer, with Some Compromises
customer_reviews.text: Our old Karcher 1800 gave out after about 8 years of use. This one is rated at 1700 but it seems even less powerful than expected. The "blaster" attachment is just not enough for stubborn concrete stains. But for washing a car, motorcycle, etc. the power is more than sufficient. Also, there is only one detergent bin so you have to rinse it out to use any other type of detergent or cleaner. What I like: the electrical cord wraps nicely around the back. I wish the washer hose could do the same. You have to wrap the washer hose tightly to get it into the plastic tub down below.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Pepoon

customer_reviews.title: poor quality , not german any more
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, barely used few times washing my car and the handle (gun) connector cracked . do not buy. The waranty its a scam, the shipping cost is more that the part itself
customer_reviews.author: Ivanov victoria

customer_reviews.title: After one use a great product I'm not sure how it will hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the pressure washer for the first time. After one use a great product I'm not sure how it will hold up but it has a three year warreny. Made the cement look line new, in one photo left part of the cement undone too show the difference a cleaning makes.
customer_reviews.author: dallasfan22

customer_reviews.title: Almost good product, misleading warranty.
customer_reviews.text: The good: - great, great design - good ergonomics - very good accessories - nice performance for light to medium duty jobs. Perfect for car wash. The bad: - internal valve on spray gun started to leak after 1 year of light use - power chord is relatively short The ugly: - Amazon.com: K1700 comes with 3-Year Warranty - Kaercher.com: K1700 "...backed by our best warranty" - Kaercher customer services says Spray Gun has only 90-day (!) warranty. Valve on Spray Gun is not sold separately, so one has to buy a whole new Spray Gun ($36.99 plus taxes)
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Second time I used it, dying video now dead...
customer_reviews.text: First time I used the pressure washer it seemed to take a long time to get to full pressure. I attributed this to the type of hose I was using and was happy with the overall performance. Today was the 2nd time I used the pressure washer and it has died. It went through the process of seemingly gaining strength as the water pressure came up then died abruptly. No power, no firepower, and I certainly didn't expect this out of a known brand that I used to trust. Needless to say I cannot recommend this product and will attempt to return something I no longer have the box for.
customer_reviews.author: DZ28

customer_reviews.title: My old power washer finally gave out.
customer_reviews.text: My old Karcher power washer finally gave out, and of course we replaced with the same brand. I got about the same size motor as the old and similar features. What is different and is significant, is that this power washer shuts off ever time you release the wand grip. So even if just stretching your hand or changing position and you release the pressure, the machine turns off. I don't like this at all because it then takes a few minutes to gain pressure and is just very interruptive.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay. For 150 dollars there isn't much to expect from it but the hose and gun are just unacceptable... BEWARE ABOUT 3 YEAR WARRANTY. Terrible customer service. The gun began to leak after a year of light use.. same place as described by others. Was told by customer service only a 90 DAY WARRANTY on all accessories.... So overall pump is good and functional but be prepared to cuss a few times dealing with the hose given.Since warranty is hiding the actual truth for the product automatic one star. When you state such a claim it should clearly state what is warrantied..
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: used twice -broke
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pressure washer twice and now it is dead--no power. would seriously not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: retired

customer_reviews.title: Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this power washer. I had a 1500 psi electric that I use to wash outdoor power equipment that I service. I figured this being an 1800 psi that I would be happy enough with it for what I expected it to do. My main concern was that it just didn't have enough psi. although from 1500 to 1800 psi isn't really much different this unit seemed to be way underpowered compared to the cheaper and lower psi brand that I had. I returned and forked over the money to buy a Generac speed wash that I absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: No more
customer_reviews.text: This is my third power washer in a decade...my second Karcher. If I ever get the urge to buy another, I hope someone hits me in the head until the urge goes away. I bought this in June, 2018 and used it to clean my house. I then stored it away in the shed. I pulled it out May, 2019, and there were some issues with using the water wand. (The trigger seemed to jam.) The motor ran for about 5 minutes, then cut out. No power whatsover. So now, I'm off to rent one, and I'll have a brand-new-looking plastic item to add to landfill waste. I really just want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Remesch

customer_reviews.title: krucher 1700 washer
customer_reviews.text: have had unit less than 3 yrs and have used it three times. the spray wand leaks like crazy even thou the unit is working. amazon stating this has a 3 year warranty is very misleading and quite false, most of the parts have only a 90 day warranty and the company is not very helpful. i have read other reviews and it seems this is a common problem for this unit, too bad, it does a decent job. because of the spray wand problem i would not recomend this product, the stated warranty is false and amazon should correct this misleading info.
customer_reviews.author: ronald desantis

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in hose!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that I've only used this 2 times and the hose kept kinking and caused a couple of holes so now it sprays water from parts of the hose. I had a cheaper version of this one for yrs and that never happened. I'm even afraid if I buy the replacement hose that it will do the same thing. It's not made out of a very good material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This is my first power washer and I bought this for the sole purpose of washing my vehicles. Build quality seems good, and while there is no good place to store the pressurized hose I do realize this is an option on the higher priced models. Water leaks from the garden hose connect. I find it hard to believe that this is 1700 psi as I can put my hand an inch away from the nozzle and it is bearable. The soap function seems to only work when it wants to, but overall I am happy with this for my application. If I needed a power washer for concrete or any medium duty use I would probably look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Karacher K1700 review
customer_reviews.text: Very nice compact little unit. Came very well packaged and went together extremely easy. For $100.00 bucks I can't complain. There is more positives than negatives. I used it for well over 90 minutes on two vehicles without a hitch. The two things I didn't like was the short electrical cord and cheesy pressure line.{not a deal breaker though}. Still a great little unit with a lot of features. P.S. make sure to empty water out of pump and pressure hose if you store in climates below 32 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: DCAndrews

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have a greenworks 1500 and this K1700. I ran them side by side and the 1500 is easily more powerful than the K1700 which is disappointing since I bought this to replace my aging greenworks. Machine also produces an odd smell during operation which I’ve never had happen with any other electric pressure washer I’ve owned before. Overall a really nice looking piece of garbage with terrible pressure.
customer_reviews.author: JJMI

customer_reviews.title: Top notch for car washing and other light house cleaning chores.
customer_reviews.text: The K1900 is very good. It performs as it is rated and it is very quiet. Its sound spectrum is not shrieking, rather a rumble, so low frequency, this is important as it is very easy on the ears and does not advertise to the neighbors what I am doing. I use it for car washing and decided that a 40-degree nozzle with a 4.0 orifice is ideal - less pressure and more water flow. If one is looking for other uses, it will work fine for wall-siding cleaning and other similar tasks. No electric pressure washer is powerful enough to do driveways and such in a reasonable short time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dias

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Soap dispenser never worked, wand started leaking at wand after a few uses. Gave up on the unit after a few uses when everything wasn't working and it was too much of a headache than it was worth. I haven't used it for a year, but tried it the other day and multiple spots on the wand leaks. I've never had this product work reliably and wish I had posted a review earlier, but I'm looking for a new pressure washer now and most certainly WILL NEVER USE KARCHER PRODUCTS AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: One year of light use and now it leaks...
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked okay (certainly better than the 15 year old cheapy it replaced) UNTIL the 90-degree elbow/valve in the spray gun developed a pinhole leak. This unit is marketed as superior with all metal connectors, but the part that gets the most stress (the valve joint) is plastic. You can't see it until the unit is under pressure, then it sprays like 25% of the water through the leak. UNUSABLE. Karcher: if you're reading this, stop letting your accountants meddle in your engineering. I have ordered a 3rd party spray gun (another $45) and hopefully will have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hines

customer_reviews.title: Difficult warranty
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for a few months then leaked water. Purchased an extended warranty for it too. Karcher has done nothing to help and the extended warranty doesn’t help because it’s still under manufacturer warranty. Extended warranty would help if karcher denied the claim but I have gotten nothing back from karcher. They say on the phone I can fill out a paper and get a replacement within a week but I haven’t gotten anything after waiting a few months. Have tried repeatedly contacting them but it’s useless. Update: I contacted karcher again, and after sending paperwork through email, I received a replacement. However getting a replacement took a lot of effort and time, I’m hoping the replacement works better.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: What Warranty?
customer_reviews.text: Spray Gun keeps spraying and leaking badly near trigger, not covered by warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Standing behind their product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this power washer a handful of times. After just over a year of elapsed time the nozzle/gun cracked on the water handler within the nozzle and water came running out the trigger part and reduced water was making it out of the nozzle. I contacted customer support and they gladly are sending a replacement gun. This is a little beyond the warranty period and we had bit of an exception but they took care of us! Good to see. This is my second Karcher and the first one was amazing. I look forward to getting to work with this one around the house. Thank you Karcher!
customer_reviews.author: fitnut

customer_reviews.title: The Adjustable Karcher T300 hard surface cleaner is incompatible with this model.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pressure washer in a bundle with a Karcher hard surface cleaner to use on our concrete paver patio. The pressure washer itself worked great - the design is easy to use and maneuver and it’s nice and quiet. Alas, the non-adjustable hard surface cleaner that ships in the bundle proved too aggressive for our surface, damaging our paver blocks. The fancier adjustable Karcher T300 hard surface cleaner is incompatible with this K1700 pressure washer. So we returned the bundle and bought a different Karcher pressure washer and the T300; that setup works great on the pavers with the pressure turned down.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Good presure washer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pressure washer. I got it for small jobs around the house. it is great for washing the cars, rinsing the back porch and cleaning the siding. I like the 3 year warranty. Unlike a lot of pressure washers that use proprietary hose connections this uses standard connections which allows me to use after market inlet and outlet connectors. It was easy to put together. I used after market connectors and haven't had a leak which is the bane of pressure washers.
customer_reviews.author: TOBG

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand!!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why this product has 4 stars.. This pressure washer is extremely frustrating to work with. I've barely used the thing and already the water is coming out of the gun and have had numerous pressure issues just for this to happen as well. From the other 1 star reviews I've seen, customer service and the "3 year warranty" are bogus as well. I WILL NOT be buying another karcher branded product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for over 3 years now and I love it. It is compact, easy to use and works really well. I do not understand some of the negative comments here, although it does appear that most of the issues surround Amazon warranty and replacement parts. I feel that you really have to screw up the assembly in order to have problems. It is VERY easy and took me about 5 minutes. A few of my neighbors borrowed it and they loved it too, so much so that one of them bought this unit. I would recommend this machine to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Paul Hinchliff

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and you'll need it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father's birthday in July of 2018. I used it for a week or so cleaning his house. Afterward, he used it several times. Since it's purchase, the trigger has broken and the unit seized up causing the breaker to trip. Overall, it is a good washer and has some nice features, but the quality is not near what I thought Karcher was up to. Fortunately, their customer service seems pretty great. I haven't contacted them myself, but my father has and received a replacement trigger quickly and once it seized up, a new machine. Maybe it's a lemon, but we'll see how the replacement works out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last year after our 9 year old Karcher broke, thinking we would try another one from Karcher. After about 16 hours of total use, it no longer has pressure. Our hose has better pressure than this thing! It also trips our breaker every time we use it. We bought the warranty, but you have to ship the 40lb machine back, which will cost as much as buying a new one. What a waste of money!!!! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: kerry a bettenhausen

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRESSURE WASHER!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is useless! They say 3 year warranty? Do not believe it. I used it 2 times ans water came shooting out of gun. water leaks out of machine where hose hooks up. Very cheaply made, hose is very stiff and will not reel up. Detergent dispenser does not work, either. CUSTOMER SERVICE is nonexistent. Kinda too bad, too sad attitude. I ordered a Sunjoe as I am sick and tired of fighting this thing. Amazon customer service was very nice and tried to help.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Hose & handle blew up today used about 10-15 times in two years. Our old Karcher was my father in laws & it last 30 yrs
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pressure washer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I watched the obsessed garage reviews of a bunch of pressure washers and decided to try this one based on his reviews. I must say I haven't been disappointed with this yet. During the reviews he complained about air in the lines. I found that any air in the lines was easy to remove. Simple run the pressure washer in the off mode. Remove the tip from the gun and allow the system to bleed itself. On average it takes only a couple of seconds. Kinds in the hose affect the washer from maintaining pressure so make sure you remove any prior to operation.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Richards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Car Washer
customer_reviews.text: A perfect car wash is a little like a rendezvous with a hooker - as little touching as possible while getting the job done. I bought this for my Summer home in Michigan which in early April often means snow, slush, salt and assorted contaminates. My Karcher offers enough power to quickly spray away the dirt, salt and muck while not harming the paint or plastic surfaces. Also, I love the thoughtful design; the foot controlled switch is great and I love the side mounted faux recepticle that safeguards the electrical plug. I have a similar Subaru electric pressure washer that I picked up at Costco but, design-wise, the Karcher is the hands-down winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace my AR Blue 383 that recently broke. It seems like a sturdy machine, with all the sounds and feels of a quality machine that will last (hopefully). However I am disappointed to say that it is very clearly has a lower output than my previous AR383. Both pressure and GPM are noticeably less. Both units are rated for 1900psi, however the AR was 1.5 GPM, where’s this Karcher is 1.2 GPM. I had hoped the AR was actually over rated or both machines would be comparable. Sadly they are not! The AR outperforms this unit by a wide margin. That said, this Karcher model does come with substantially nicer wand and nozzle tips.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: I must say that owning a gas pressure washer and not be able to use it every time I want to wash my car this little pressure washer has won it place. This power washer looks nice, lighter, sound different and has a lot of power. I really love this pressure washer. To really enjoy the whole car wash experience you should upgrade the gun, hose and replace everything with quick connectors. You wont regret it. Thanks Karcher !
customer_reviews.author: Julio Split

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I have always believed in this company's products up until now. Yes, it was easy to put together and it's easy to maneuver add easy to use it however Falls tremendously short and its effectiveness when using it. I bought this to replace an older unit that I had that was the same water pressure as this one. The old one was much more effective. I also do not like the fact that my older attachments will not fit the new one as they changed the connectors so all of the investment that I made in their product earlier than this is now useless to me. I will not be buying anything further from this company because of this.
customer_reviews.author: George R. Faller

customer_reviews.title: A must-have to every home owner!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, powerful, easy to move and use. No regrets. We did a lot of research and that machine give us exactly what we wanted: almost industrial power for regular-Joe price. With a new house and bills to pay, we put our priority on quality and durability. This pressure washer is doing it for us. For clean the house, gutter, pavement, cat litter boxes, truck and even so much more (the soap tool is awesome), that machine does the job without complication. Pretty decent price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: G Garber

customer_reviews.title: The right stuff for car washing
customer_reviews.text: Used exclusively for my cars Very light weight, convenient, and relatively sturdy. Could use a bit more power but enough power to wash the cars. The hose and wand are lightweight and maneuverable. But an upgrade will help with gallons per minute. Light on the accessories but good price and warranty (3years which includes no hassle replacement) Bottom line, good little machine designed for exactly what I use it for. Just don't confuse it with a gas pressure washer. I've used it twice for 3 hours so far.
customer_reviews.author: John ezell

customer_reviews.title: This machine would get 5 stars but gun failed early.
customer_reviews.text: This is a light-duty machine. I use it to clean the deck and sidewalks, so two days out of a year. I purchased it April 2017 and used it that year, and in 2018, and 2019. I began cleaning the sidewalk in 2020, and after about 15 minutes the gun started leaking from the seams. So, after 6 uses I had to spend $40 for a replacement gun. Otherwise, the machine is good and it does a good job of getting things clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wifeyknowsitall

customer_reviews.title: Great seller. Item arrived on time as described
customer_reviews.text: Great seller. Item arrived on time as described. Not built nearly as well as Karcher power washer it replaced which I had for about 25 years. I don't expect this one to last anywhere near as long. Sufficient power for what I need done and attachments are useful. 1 year update - Nozzle leaks profusely after maybe 8 uses. Piece of crap as I suspected it would be a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Marx

customer_reviews.title: Great power washer.
customer_reviews.text: Pressure washer works great for home use. I use it to wash all 3 of my cars. When you rinse the soap off it pushes a lot of the water off the body and windows. Gets the brakes dust and grime off the wheels. Use also to get stains off the driveway and rinse the patio and sides of the house. I don’t recommend using in the engine compartment due to the high pressure. It will get into electrical connectors and places water shouldn’t be causing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Indie

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure washer. It’s light, compact, and does a great job cleaning. It doesn’t have the muscle to strip layers of dirt on a large area, but for small jobs, it is perfect. You will need to buy a flexible longer hose and replace the gun if the one provided starts to leak. However for the price of the pressure washer, it’s well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 months then the psi dropped to less than half. Working on getting it replaced under warranty
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Go to another brand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Karcher less that a year ago. It was working fine for a while. Now it leaks a great amount of water from the trigger and because of this the engine doesn’t stop when you release the trigger. I’m extremely careful taking care of my gadgets, so I’m very disappointed with it. I submitted a ticket through Karcher customer service webpage, but haven’t heard of them in a week... Don’t waist your money on they like I did. I regret not having read all the bad reviews before...!
customer_reviews.author: Silvina

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pressure to clean as illustrated in the videos
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was excited to get it but it had no power plus it wasn’t consistent with the pressure so I tried switching outlets thinking maybe it was the outlet and still the pressure was inconsistent and not strong enough to clean the deck or driveway. My neighbors cheap electric power pressure washer performs way better and I think we will go to QVC to get it ...
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Decent pressure washer but 3 yr warranty misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit 1-1/2 years ago with a 3 year warranty. This was my 2nd Karcher and it performed satisfactory under just recently. Water started pouring out of the handle. Looks like the valve seam failed. Called Karcher and was told the 3 year warranty was on the motor and did not cover the trigger gun. The cost of a replacement gun was going to be over $40. Disappointed! I’m now researching other pressure washer brands.
customer_reviews.author: KWW

customer_reviews.title: Good spayer, metal coupling, but not infinitly adjustable nozzle
customer_reviews.text: My previous Karcher had less power (1300) but it was made in Italy and lasted 23 years (home use). This new one is powerful, but I was disappointed that its power nozzle was not infinitely adjustable (like my old one). The power nozzle does a corkscrew pattern of a fine stream which simulates the old one and works o.k. But I resort to the 15 degree nozzle for the tough jobs . (My old adjustable nozzle is not compatible - too bad). I hope this new Karcher K1700 made in China lasts as long. The K1700 has good storage and connections and rolls around nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: No 3yr warranty, good luck with that, save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money other cheaper products are better, I purchased this product with “3 yr warranty”, expected to get better than average product. Spray trigger started gushing water after 14 months of extremely light use, 2x uses first summer, broke first use this year. Karcher says wand only has 90 day warranty, sorry you’re out of luck. Total BS, I’ve had cheaper washers that have lasted well over 5 years, this one is trash. FYI the valve body of the wand is plastic and it split down the seam, that’s what broke, very cheaply made. Shop for other products. Karcher is not the quality it may have once been.
customer_reviews.author: JOLYNN R MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good at first. We bought a year ago to wash the driveway. Used 2 times and that's it. The pressure washer was in the garage. It took about 6 months, and the trigger gun stopped working. And of course this is not included in the warranty. I am very sad. I have to wash the driveway again, and the gun doesn't work. Don't buy, it will be wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Olesya

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year. Garbage!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought about a year ago. The included house busted within 3 uses. Not a big deal. I bought an upgraded hose and used it a few more times. Now the unit won't turn on at all. Used the reset button. No light even comes on. So I have a 3 year warranty. Let's see how this works out. I'll update in regards to warranty and customer service. Just an update. I called "customer support " Its a busy signal. So good luck trying to contact anyone
customer_reviews.author: nathan fyock

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: After a long history of failed electric power washers, I have high hopes for this one. Pressure is as advertised. Does a good job on all household uses, especially mold on stone walkways. Canister design is very stable, which has always been a problem with the upright models. All the connections and other parts seem to be high quality. Especially like how easy it is to access hose connector. Only issue is that it seems to take a long time to get to full pressure. Pressure goes up and down for the first few minutes. Seems like there is air that needs to clear. Might be a way around that.
customer_reviews.author: William Ruffin

customer_reviews.title: No suds buds
customer_reviews.text: I planned on using this exclusively for washing cars I keep it hooked up at all times because we live on a dirt road. I like the convenience of my previous pressure washer just switch tips and suds come out as this one was supposed to do. I notified the company of the problem and they very quickly send me a replacement unit... Which again did not dispense the soap when the soap tip Was put on. So if you are planning on using this for washing your car, you better also buy a bucket also.
customer_reviews.author: caroljean kane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item appeared to be NIB but was inoperative upon arrival; fulfilled by Amazon.com. Enough said
customer_reviews.author: dpal

customer_reviews.title: Works well and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need a high poweredgas pressure washer with 3000 lbs of pressure. So I opted for the Karcher at 1700 lbs. Works as advertised and is what I need for the jobs I have - mostly home and patio cleaning. Also used it for car wash and here the lower power is great for car paint. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Pump leaks oil and is not long for the World
customer_reviews.text: This performed respectably well out of the box. The supplied nozzles had uneven pattern, with “hot spots” on the outsides of the fan. Bought new nozzles made in the USA which transformed the performance with increased pressure and flow. The pump is now leaking oil all over my epoxy garage floor and is making a lot of extra curricular noise. I suspect it’s going to blow up any day now.
customer_reviews.author: Friendly Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and portable hydroblaster
customer_reviews.text: Very good performance. Ergonomic and easily folded to minimize trunk space when transporting. Uses standard jets and has an excellent turbo unit we call "the grenade". Have bought one as a gift and then one for myself. Both units have been 100% reliable. Also bought a high end distributor head for cleaning sidewalks and plastic roofs quickly. Solid design and good value from a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I had the opportunity to try several different brands of pressure washers at this price point, I order this one last after being disappointed with the other two. This one hold up to its claims, use it primarily for car washing, easy to use, very mobile and quick setup and put away. So far very happy, Nice to know I have a three year warranty on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Water Saving Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: Build Quality is all plastic and the fittings leak..I used Leak Lock and its holding. I use it to wash my vehicles and nothing else at 1.2GPM, don't try to do a driveway or anything else for that matter. for everything. else I have a gas pressure washer at 2.6gpm.
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Nozzle Broken
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at the end of February. However, after only the second use, the turbo nozzle completely stopped working. The trigger would not work when connected to the hose. It’s made of cheap plastic and definitely doesn’t last long. While it worked, it did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Long

customer_reviews.title: pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this washer to wash my rv and cars. the unit worked very well. I liked how it holds pressure at the wand. Did a great job with a foam cannon. i would have given this a 5 if it wasn't for the hose. it's cheep and short. But i knew this going in. I swapped it out for a 50 foot 3/8 hose and a better wand. Now it has higher gpm and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Caluda

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: used it once last year and it worked well. This year, I could not get it to work. Each time I tried to start it, the GFI would trip. I would reset it and it would trip again. I was ready to return it but first called customer support. To my surprise I was able to speak with someone within 5 minutes. They advised pressing the reset ,test, then reset button again. This worked although I did not find that information in the owners manual. Apparently it has something to do with the ground circuit. After that it worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: uu

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, lightweight and easy
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is almost as good as my gas powered 2400 psi, but I feel (even with the cord) the Karcher K1700 is more convenient. Plug it in an go. Great cord, hose and accessory storage. Light weight and easy for my wife to use. The soap additive works during high pressure, not low pressure like other models I have had. It is my go to pressure washer for everyday use, even concrete brightening and will now get more use than my Gas Powered one.
customer_reviews.author: F Gable

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality as described.
customer_reviews.text: The reel is so hard to pull out the line that it makes it fall over. I tried oiling it and still doesn't work. The hose is also very stiff poor quality not very flexable. Overall this product for twice the money was a big let down. It also doesn't start spraying like the brand I replaced for a second or so so everytime you pull the trigger you have to wait for it to build pressure back up. annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Strongwi

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use the pressure washer to get stubborn stains out of the concrete and to use my car soaking equipment. Wand broke in just over a year but easily replaceable. The unit stopped working about 6 months before the warranty. That being said, it was an inexpensive option and did the job. Had it not been for the breakdown, I would have given it five stars. However, the customer service was great. Just filled a form out and provided them with my proof of purchase and serial sticker. Had a new unit delivered within 2 weeks. No questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Mr TDN

customer_reviews.title: Functions Well but awkward to use ,  manufacturer Customer Service and Warranty fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Functions Well but awkward to use although it has a real to store the hose and in theory it would be great however the hand crank constantly gets stuck it has good power and although it’s all plastic it’s well-made I had a problem with mine But they Karcher the manufacturers shipped a new one out immediately very painless If only other companies had Customer Service as good
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Its only when you have used other electric pressure washers do you appreciate the better design of this unit. From the placement of its hose connections and its electric cord location (less tangling), to its nice space for organization of hoses and attachments as well as its overall stability while in use (aka not tip over like other units tend to do). Glad I chose this unit over the others.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 7-8 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine (K2000) for just on 2 years but have only used it about 7-8 times. Firstly the soap dispenser has never worked - baffled - spoke to a rep just after I got it but we could not find the fault but today suddenly it started to leak at the trigger and after opening up the handle I saw the trigger nozzle plastic was cracked !!! How frustrating. This is bad manufacturing and /or poor design? Has anyone else had this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Martin S.

customer_reviews.title: The pressure washer works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had another Karcher pressure washer before but it finally broke after more than 10 years. I researched and decided to buy this from the warehouse with some discount. The unit definitely has been opened but appeared unused without missing parts. However, it doesn't come with the lamp instructions. I put it together and did some tests right away. The unit works as expected. I like the storage and the compactness of it for storage.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Now with standard fittings.
customer_reviews.text: After having a 1800psi Karcher with a hose reel that I did not care for, something that weighed less was wanted. There was also a need for a M22 connection for my house cleaning wand. This unit fit my needs and works well. If Karcher had not gone to the industry M 22 standard hose I would have had to buy another brand. This is my third Karcher having worn out the other two and I am happy with the company.
customer_reviews.author: JJDC

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the Karcher pressure quickly cleaning some lawn furniture ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the Karcher pressure quickly cleaning some lawn furniture that I hadn't been able to clean before. The second time I used the unit the high pressure hose developed a hole in it, within two days Karcher sent a new replacement hose under warranty. Thanks Karcher for your great service.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Birdsall Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but short hose line.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded the Karcher 1700 hose and gun to aftermarket specs. Stock hose and wand just weren’t working for me. The unit works well, however. It only runs when the trigger is pulled, and it’s not loud at all.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Encinitas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure washer. It’s a little louder than I was expecting but works great for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Hunk of junk
customer_reviews.text: Has this washer about a year. It is very difficult to hook up to a hose, it’s like they manufactured the hose connection wrong. Worked once I could hook it up, but after taking it out of winter storage one of the nozzles is rusted and unusable and the wand handle leaks like noviys business. Don’t waste your money, try something else!
customer_reviews.author: Callie C.

customer_reviews.title: 4.5+ stars
customer_reviews.text: The washer itself seems to work well. I had some issues with the power cord safety reset/dongle being too sensitive and shutting off often, which caused frustration. Each time, I had to locate an electric outlet where it would not activate. Otherwise, the washer was not functional as it would quickly shut off as soon as I started. Otherwise it worked great, thus the 4.5+ stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leckey

customer_reviews.title: Best toy out there. KEEP OFF from FREEZING.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a friend. He enjoys it, works well. Over winter store it in warm place. Like your basement. Otherwise the water that remains inside will freeze and destroy it.
customer_reviews.author: Crmr

customer_reviews.title: Gun brakes after one year
customer_reviews.text: It's not the worse power washer The gun broke the year after I bought it It is a defective piece and now I need to buy a gun for it I think karcher shoukd replace it for free.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Happy birthday to me!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting the pressure washer to arrive until Monday but UPS is awesome and delivered it Saturday. I washed my house, driveway, shed, mailbox, and my duaghters play house the same day and I was pretty impressed by the results. I love the ease of use and I expect that this pressure washer will last a few years at least. Well done Karcher.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for Homeowner Use.
customer_reviews.text: We love this manageable little pressure washer. Reasonably priced, with 3 year warranty. The pressure is not so high that a novice user will easily carve up the wood deck and high enough that it works as intended. We washed everything. Deck, house, driveway, sidewalk. We wore out the brass quick connect on the tip of the gun and they are sending a new gun assembly, no charge, under 3 year warranty plan.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Byrd

customer_reviews.title: It failed after the fifth use.
customer_reviews.text: At the fourth use, the gun leaked water. It came from the plastic moulded body of the internal components of the gun. I bought a spare gun after some research, found one that fits my K1700 , and the second time I used it, the electric motor burned, a burnt smell and smoke came iout of he motor . Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: ... Europe) but this one is definitely one of the best I worked with
customer_reviews.text: I've owned Karcher pressure washers before (in Europe) but this one is definitely one of the best I worked with; powerful spray and different nozzles to choose from and washing my (4 car) drive way and large patio without any issues. Price and quality wise I don't think you can go wrong on this one. When you pick a pressure washer, make sure it has the induction motor as they last. Why I didn't give it five stars? I just used it four times now, will update after at least using it for ten times.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Spent a few more and buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this machine, 20 times of use, lot a water star coming out from de gun, the trigger valve had a little crack, not recommend
customer_reviews.author: GOS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of equipment so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment so far. Been using it for the past month or so with no issues. Has plenty of power for pretty much anything. Used it to clean off years of mildew off the siding of our house we recently bought. I'll use this pressure washer for hours on weekends and so far it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Big wheels, low clearance
customer_reviews.text: Great but beware. Only certain Karcher accessories fit this model. Has large whhels but the ground clearance makes it hard to drag over grass or uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An amazing power washer.........
customer_reviews.text: This power washer is worth every penny! Incredible power, great attachments, and great lengths of power cord and spray hose. Right out of the box I used it for hours and it performed perfectly! It can handle everything from the toughest stains to the most delicate cleaning (just hold it a bit further from the object you are cleaning) Slightly more expensive, but made by the best in the business, so well worth it. It seem,s like it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: The Shark

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this product do a remarkable job of cleaning our deck but I also used it to remove the weeds and grass that had grown up in the cracks of the concrete patio.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Young

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite machine.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. Cleaned the sidewalk. Cleaned the roof tiles. Cleaned the block wall. Cleaned the plastic floor cover for the back of the SUV. Cleaned the BBQ grill. Plenty of power for 1700. Very easy to use. Clear instructions on the machine. The only additional instruction I would add is to pull hard on the nozzle to make sure it is secured tight. I shot the 15 across the street by accident. Could have impaled someone/thing.
customer_reviews.author: Renee K

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: It works better than I ever expected, considering it is electrical I figured thst it would be lacking in power, but it didn't I power washed a deck and it came out great. I don't think I would use it to was parking lots or heavy duty use but for around the house I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine for washing my car.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for washing my car. It works very well for that task. I’ve also done some spraying of my concrete patio and it takes off mold/mildew without any chemicals. Very happy with the machine. Hoping it will last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: Strong pressure, easy to indtall tips. Easy on and off Do fsr so good. 2 years of use
customer_reviews.author: David W. Oriel

customer_reviews.title: good reliable portable pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: This is a good reliable pressure washer for the money. 2000 psi rated and when washing my Polaris General 4 it did as great job. I love the tips that can change the flow and spray, the soap ad mixture works very well and uses the mixture to great advantage, you truly get soap, not spittle. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ercanbrack

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I did not get a spray wand in the box but I got one within a week after I called Kärcher. I used this for the first time today on two different cars the pressure is perfect for it I love how light it is, the start/stop function also rids the loud noise you get from a gas pressure washer. I use this with a foam cannon and everything works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Masn McWhite

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Used about 6 times and now it just sprays water out of every joint . I guess its decent but not the best , wont buy again
customer_reviews.author: daniel morales

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this one is really nice
customer_reviews.text: Great little pressure washer. Adequate cleaning power and no more fooling around with a gas engine. Nice design and on-board storage too.
customer_reviews.author: Flint-Stone

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a big mistake buying this machine from Amazon. No Product support. If you would buy this from a store the store can handle warranty. Amazon just gives you a link to Karcher. Overall this is a bear bones cheap pressure washer with very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: very awesome so far you can tell the quality it’s no kranzel but y’all abojt value. it’s good for diy for the professional it be a good backup.
customer_reviews.author: jayruz

product_meta.title: Karcher K1800 Electric Power Pressure Washer 1800 PSI TruPressure, 3-Year Warranty, Turbo Nozzle Included
product_meta.description: The all-new K1800 was developed to offer high cleaning performance and unparalleled ease of use. This electric pressure washer delivers 1800 PSI of , ensuring you get the highest level of cleaning power and driven by a reliable universal motor. It includes convenient features such as a unique on/off foot switch, a handy storage bin, large one-half gallon removable detergent tank and three spray nozzles (including a turbo nozzle for intense cleaning). Metal hose connections, oversized no-flat wheels and an integrated aluminum frame make this unit highly durable. Universal quick-connect nozzles and standard M22 hose connections simplify nozzle and accessory usage. Best of all, no tools are needed for assembly- you can set up and start using the K1800 in five minutes or less! When you're done cleaning, simply fold down the handle for compact storage. Backed by a three year limited warranty, the K1800 electric pressure washer is perfect for tackling typical outdoor cleaning jobs.
feature_bullets: 1800 PSI, 1.2 GPM electric pressure washer with convenient on/off foot switch
Folding handle for compact storage, takes up less garage space
Includes three nozzles: turbo nozzle for maximum cleaning power on stubborn areas, 15° all-purpose nozzle and detergent nozzle
Large removable bin for hassle-free storage of accessories and personal items
Easy 5 minute setup – no tools required!
3 Year limited warranty with industry-leading rapid exchange program
Heavy-duty frame and all-metal hose connections for maximum durability. Removable detergent tank for easy use and cleanup
Compatible with industry-standard pressure washer accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars137 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
